name: Warriors, Rogues and Wizards
description:
Warriors, Rogues and Wizards is a simple fantasy turn-based tactics game made with HTML5. The game features retro pixel-art, turn-based gameplay and simple tactical combat. You will control a three-man party of adventurerers – a warrior, a rogue and a wizard – facing various adversaries and earning lots of gold in a high-fantasy world.

The game combat features rock-paper-scissors mechanic: melee characters beat ranged/flying characters, ranged/flying characters beat spellcaster characters and spellcaster characters beat melee characters. When you run out green flags (top left of the screen), you will lose; if red flags (top right of the screen) of an enemy party run out, the enemy party will lose. After every victory you will earn gold which you can spend to buy more green flags or more luck for the next combat. Luck allows you to see enemy's character choice and to deal extra damage randomly.

CONTROLS
Key 1 - Choose a warrior
Key 2 - Choose a rogue
Key 3 - Choose a wizard
